row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) !setting values for definition in uc4.smd/uc4.smc file. replace default agent WIN01/UNIX01 :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "Windows" : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_OLD_TEXT# = "DEFINE UC4 WIN01.*" :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_OLD_TEXT# = "DEFINE UC4 UNIX01.*" :ENDIF
:PRINT "Setting Agent Name to LOCALAGENT as default" :SET &UC4RB_SM_AGENT_NAME# = "LOCALAGENT" :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# <> "" : PRINT "Agent Name defined - using &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# as Name" : SET &UC4RB_SM_AGENT_NAME# = &UC4RB_AGENT_NAME# :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "Windows" : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_NEW_TEXT# = "DEFINE &UC4RB_SM_PHRASE# &UC4RB_SM_AGENT_NAME#;&UC4RB_AGENT_DIRECTORY#\&UC4RB_AGENT_BIN_FILE#;&UC4RB_AGENT_DIRECTORY#" :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_NEW_TEXT# = "DEFINE &UC4RB_SM_PHRASE# &UC4RB_SM_AGENT_NAME#;&UC4RB_AGENT_DIRECTORY#/bin/&UC4RB_AGENT_BIN_FILE#;&UC4RB_AGENT_DIRECTORY#/bin" :ENDIF :PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMC_COMMAND# = "WAIT 0\r\nCREATE &UC4RB_SM_PHRASE# &UC4RB_SM_AGENT_NAME#"
!:PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_FILE_FULL# = &UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR# !building paths to smc/smd file relative and for smd also full qualified :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "Windows" : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMC_FILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "\UC4.smc") : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_FILE_FULL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "\UC4.smd") : ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMC_FILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "\bin\uc4.smc") : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_FILE_FULL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "\bin\uc4.smd") : ENDIF :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMC_FILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "/bin/uc4.smc") : PSET &UC4RB_SM_SMD_FILE_FULL# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_OUT_SM_DIR#, "/bin/uc4.smd") :ENDIF
